did.unittitle: ILGWU Local 1 Cloak & Suit Operators Documents, 1899-1918
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Three documents relating to Harry Brown and his membership in the Cloak and Suit Operators, Local 1 of the International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union.

scopecontent.p: Included are a letter to Mr. Brown from the Joint Board of the Cloak and Skirt Makers Unions of Greater New York (1916), an Honorable Withdrawal Card from the International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union (1918), and Brown's US citizenship certificate (1899).

controlaccess.corpname: International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union. Local 1 (New York, N.Y.)

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: ILGWU Local 1 Cloak & Suit Operators Documents #5482m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Includes letter to Mr. Brown from the Joint Board of the Cloak and Skirt Makers Unions of Greater New York (1916) and an Honorable Withdrawal Card from the International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union (1918).
